subject: Management
title: Signals Something Is Going Wrong
description: A micro-lesson that makes Signals Something Is Going Wrong usable.

hook.text: The deliverable was due Friday. On Thursday, the manager learned it hadn't been started.

buildup.text: Early warning signs include missed mini-deadlines, avoidance, and vague progress updates.

discovery.text: Build in milestones so problems surface early, not at the final deadline.

twist.text: People often hide struggles to avoid looking incompetent. Safe reporting prevents this.

climax.text: Normalize 'I'm stuck' as a status update. That's a feature, not a failure.

quiz.question: How can managers catch delegation problems early?
options: Build in milestones and normalize reporting struggles
Wait until the final deadline to review
Check in every hour for updates
